attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the Prime Minister I feel that you should call an immediate General Election so the peolple of this country can decide who they want to guide this country through the difficult economic situation you and your Government have warned us of.
    At the time of the last election you were elected by the people in  apparently stable ecomonic conditions, the same was true when the Labour Party allowed you to take over as Prime Minister.
    I now feel that we the people should be given the immediate opportunity, to either show our backing to you and the present government or replace this Government with one of our choosing.
    This process needs to be now, as the decisions made now at Government level will whoever makes them, effect us for many years to come, so as this will effect the voting public of today we should decide who make those decisions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
